PersonalStatement.text: Joel Edwards, born on 1982-03-27, is a Male based in West Robert, Uruguay. He is Single and holds Nigerian nationality. Currently working at Taylor-Shepherd.

WorkExperience.text: Research Scientist at Brown-Holloway from 2008 to 2018.
Senior Financial Analyst at Taylor-Shepherd, 2021 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Financial Economics from Università degli Studi di Udine
Master's in Engineering from National Taipei University

PersonalSkills.text: Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.
Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys hiking.
